channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Nvidia's beat and raise eases investors' concerns about 4 things nagging the stock
item.description: Shares of Nvidia remain below their Jan. 24 close around $142, the Friday before all the DeepSeek turmoil started.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Salesforce misses on revenue, issues disappointing guidance
item.description: Salesforce missed analysts' expectations for quarterly revenue in its top two categories.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Nvidia's auto segment revenue surges to record high on demand for driver-assist tech
item.description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia's auto segment revenue doubled in the latest quarter to its highest on record as demand for driver-assist software picked up.

item.title: Salesforce sinks on weak guidance — here's the biggest takeaway for the bulls
item.description: This was not the cleanest earnings report, but the immediate reaction in extended trading was overdone.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Shares of British aerospace giant Rolls-Royce hit all-time high on upbeat outlook, profit beat
item.description: Rolls-Royce on Thursday posted stronger-than-expected full-year earnings after making what it described as "significant" transformation progress.
